query:
SELECT id as "id!: i32", 
holder_id as "holder_id!: i32", 
amount as "amount!: String", 
balance as "balance!: String", 
contract_cycle as "contract_cycle!: String", 
created_at as "created_at!: DateTime < Utc >" FROM estimated_fee_pool_claims WHERE (NOT $1::boolean OR id = $2::int4) AND (NOT $3::boolean OR holder_id = $4::int4) AND (NOT $5::boolean OR amount = $6::varchar) AND (NOT $7::boolean OR balance = $8::varchar) AND (NOT $9::boolean OR balance > $10::varchar) AND (NOT $11::boolean OR contract_cycle = $12::varchar) AND (NOT $13::boolean OR created_at = $14::timestamptz) ORDER BY 
      (CASE ($15 = 'Id' AND NOT $16) WHEN true THEN id ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($15 = 'Id' AND $16) WHEN true THEN id ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($15 = 'HolderId' AND NOT $16) WHEN true THEN holder_id ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($15 = 'HolderId' AND $16) WHEN true THEN holder_id ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($15 = 'Amount' AND NOT $16) WHEN true THEN amount ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($15 = 'Amount' AND $16) WHEN true THEN amount ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($15 = 'Balance' AND NOT $16) WHEN true THEN balance ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($15 = 'Balance' AND $16) WHEN true THEN balance ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($15 = 'ContractCycle' AND NOT $16) WHEN true THEN contract_cycle ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($15 = 'ContractCycle' AND $16) WHEN true THEN contract_cycle ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($15 = 'CreatedAt' AND NOT $16) WHEN true THEN created_at ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($15 = 'CreatedAt' AND $16) WHEN true THEN created_at ELSE NULL END) DESC
     LIMIT $17 OFFSET $18 FOR UPDATE
